Location Utilities¶

CommonLocationUtils¶

class CommonLocationUtils¶

Bases: object

Utilities for manipulating locations and lots.

static current_lot_has_all_traits(lot_trait_ids: Tuple[int]) → bool¶

Determine if the Current Lot has all of the specified Lot Traits.

static current_lot_has_any_traits(lot_trait_ids: Tuple[int]) → bool¶

Determine if the Current Lot has any of the specified Lot Traits.

static current_lot_has_trait(lot_trait_id: int) → bool¶

Determine if the Current Lot has the specified Lot Trait.

static current_venue_allows_role_state_routing() → bool¶

Determine if the current venue allows routing for role states.

static current_venue_requires_player_greeting() → bool¶

Determine if the current venue requires player greeting.

static get_current_lot() → world.lot.Lot¶

Retrieve the current lot.

static get_current_lot_id() → int¶

Retrieve the identifier for the Current Lot.

static get_current_venue_type() → venues.venue_tuning.VenueTypes¶

Retrieve the type of the current venue.

static get_current_zone() → zone.Zone¶

Retrieve the current zone.

static get_current_zone_id() → int¶

Retrieve the current zone id.

static get_lot_traits(lot_id: int) → Tuple[zone_modifier.zone_modifier.ZoneModifier]¶

Retrieve the Lot Traits of a Lot with the specified identifier.

static get_lot_traits_of_current_lot() → Tuple[zone_modifier.zone_modifier.ZoneModifier]¶

Retrieve the Lot Traits of the Current Lot.

static get_venue_of_current_lot() → venues.venue_tuning.Venue¶

Retrieve a Venue for the current lot.

static get_zone_id(zone: zone.Zone) → int¶

Retrieve the identifier of the specified Zone.

static is_current_venue_residential() → bool¶

Determine if a venue is residential.

static is_location_outside_current_lot(location: sims4.math.Location) → bool¶

Determine if a location is outside of the current lot or not.

static is_location_outside_lot(location: sims4.math.Location, lot_id: int) → bool¶

Determine if a location is outside of the Lot with the specified identifier.

static is_position_on_current_lot(position: protocolbuffers.Math_pb2.Vector3) → bool¶

Determine if a sim is on the current lot.

CommonTravelUtils¶

class CommonTravelUtils¶

Bases: object

Utilities for moving Sims around.

static travel_to_home_lot_of(sim_info: sims.sim_info.SimInfo)¶

Send the specified Sim to their Home Lot.

static travel_to_home_lot_of_active_sim(sim_info: sims.sim_info.SimInfo)¶

Send the specified Sim to the Home Lot of the Active Sim.

static travel_to_lot(sim_info: sims.sim_info.SimInfo, lot_id: int)¶

Send the specified Sim to the Lot with the specified id.
